## Just like an RMarkdown

Show code ...

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
msleep
```

<br>

... or show a nicer table ...

```{r, echo=FALSE}
msleep %>% filter(vore == "carni") %>% knitr::kable()
```

... or show a plot

```{r, fig.cap = "Wow captions too!"}
ggplot(msleep, aes(x = sleep_total, y = bodywt)) +
  geom_point() + scale_x_log10() + scale_y_log10()
```

I can even put some math $e^x$ or more
$$e^{\pi i} + 1 = 0.$$
